duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and manage daily load planning process for warehouses using TMS application.
Resolve load plan issues and facilitate on-time shipping in collaboration with Warehouse Operation teams.
Identify cost-saving opportunities, streamline processes, and automate efficiency within the network.
Communicate and develop solutions for exception/at-risk shipments to ensure timely flow of goods.
Manage carrier partners, review performance, and design improvements to the supply chain based on business priorities.
Serve as the key operational contact for building teams, downstream, and carrier partners.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Logistics, Transportation, or a related field (Master's preferred)
